instructions: Open the Twitter app on your iOS or Android device and tap the compose button. Tap the camera icon. Tap Live . Tap Add location and select your preferred location for the Twitter live stream. Tap What's happening? and type the text you want to go along with your live stream. This could be the title of your broadcast or a casual message to your follows to encourage them to tune in. Tap Go Live to immediately begin your Twitter live stream. When you're ready to finish your live stream on Twitter, tap Stop in the top-left corner. A confirmation option will pop up. Tap Stop broadcast to confirm the end of your live stream or Cancel to continue streaming.
